Summary: We saw a row of lights outside my window( in the sky)
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around February 16th 1988
divs: Sighting DetailsWe (myself and my cousin) noticed lights outside my window, up in the sky. I looked at them and studied them:They were bright white circles standing in a vertical formation.About 5 of them.When I looked closer these lights were moving in circular motions while remaining in a vertical line. We were on our way to bed and my cousin said"Whats with all the lights?" She ignored them but i watched for about 5 mins.I wasnt sure what to make of it so i dismissed it and went into bed.While I was in bed I began thinking about the lights and a cloud of light sleepy air took over my mind and then I went to sleep.
